If we get big, special interest money out of our elections, it will force lawmakers to listen to their constituents. #CitizensUnited
If big money can’t get you to vote how they want you to, they’ll do everything they can to keep you from voting. #CitizensUnited
If we don’t give regular Americans a real say in how they are governed, we might as well hang a “For Sale” sign on the doors of the Capitol.
Our election system is broken.  We must take action. #CitizensUnited
A lot of folks in Congress talk about working together. But the threat of big money coming after them in their next election holds them back
The explosion of money in politics is a threat to our democracy – and it’s only made worse when that money is secret and untraceable.
Who do you think is going to have a bigger influence on the political process? The wealthy? Or regular folks?  #CitizensUnited
This Supreme Court just doesn’t get it. They don’t understand the corrosive power of uncontrolled money in politics. #CitizensUnited
Our campaign finance laws worked pretty well for a century. But 2 years ago the US SupCo struck down Montana's Corrupt Practices Act.
We demanded fair elections because we were tired of wealthy mining corporations operating our state like it was a branch of their companies.
My state has passed some of the most comprehensive campaign finance laws in the country. #CitizensUnited
If we don’t move quickly & forcefully to get big money out of our elections, it will give the wealthy a vice grip on our government.
